text: Look at me when I'm yelling at you!
If it wasn't for me you wouldn't be standing here before me now! You cannot let yourself get killed again!
If you go along without me, you'll probably end up dead! So I will join you now!

choices.text: Uhh, look at the time. I need to go. Bye!

text: Don't you dare to run away from me again!

choices.text: Well... Whoa! Look over there, what's that?!

text: You tell me you have made room in your party!

choices.text: Well... Whoa! Look over there, what's that?!

text: It seems your party is already full.
I cannot join you if there's no room.
Do you want me to leave your party?

choices.text: No, I want you to stay.

text: All his equipment will also be gone once you bury him.

choices.text: No, I need to take precautions first.
